section.p: ‘Stop, stop, I surrender!’ yells the tree. You cease your attack. ‘I guess you can pass, in view of recent events!’ it says grudgingly. Then it uproots itself with a great tearing sound, and shuffles out of the way. ‘There you go!’ mutters the tree, ‘You can blooming well pass.’
You walk through the thorn bush gate. Beyond, you find several huge oak trees whose branches are so big that they are able to support the homes of many people.
